content:
There was once a six-fingered performer at the amusement park,
Who used the tools you're holding now...
And ended up with one finger less.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持斧子闲聊（日常）-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Using balloons to go "pop-pop-BOOM" through trees and rocks,
One day,
This invention will change the world!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持斧子闲聊（日常）-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Why can't we make mattocks
out of balloons instead?
Wouldn't that be much safer?

content:
Please be careful when using this.
In the exciting moment of smashing wood and stones,
it's easy to forget you're holding a dangerous tool.

content:
Gahahahaha~ha! It's just a joke!
All the performers in the park still have their fingers intact,
Just be careful when using them, okay?
